00127 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00128 
00129 inline bool MuonReconstructionAlgorithm::SortByDistanceToTrack(const TrackDistanceInfo &lhs, const TrackDistanceInfo &rhs)
00130 {
00131     return (lhs.second < rhs.second);
00132 }
